Header: 'India Today', 'News 18 India', 'DD News' & Local 'Derana', 'Hiru TV', Rupawahini & 'Sirasa TV' Interviews Feature Commander of the Army
Content: Popular TV channels in India whose journalists/presenters were in Colombo had separate face-to-face interviews with the Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake at his office at the Army Headquarters. Similarly, 'Derana', 'Hiru TV', Rupawahini and 'Sirasa TV' in Sri Lanka also had exclusive interviews with the Army Chief. See Annexed Videos:
